entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
